name: dicehub UI Kit (v2)
description:
What is the dicehub UI kit?


We are building a real-time collaboration platform for fluid dynamics simulations. Think of it like Figma for engineers and scientists, except instead of design, they work on 3D simulations like car aerodynamics. This requires very specific design decisions and unique UX/UI solutions, which are reflected in this toolkit.


If you want to see our platform and see the result:


https://dicehub.com


Update in v2:

  • Accessibility
  • System
  • Iconography
  • Breadcrumbs
  • Controls
  • Code


Made with ❤️ by dicehub


---

(This is probably only 10% of what we prepared to make public, so in coming weeks more and more components will be added)
